'''Dealer's Sleight''' is [[Yelan]]'s Level 5 [[Constellation]].

==Trivia ==
*{{Lang|The second part of the Chinese name|zh=三仙戏法|zh_rm=sānxiān xìfǎ}} originated from a traditional Chinese magic trick called "{{Lang|Three Immortals Return to the Hole|zh=三仙归洞|zh_rm=sānxiān guīdòng}}."
